root.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `LABEL` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `category` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `en_us` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `ru_by` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `pl_pl` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=473 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

UPDATE `LABEL` SET `en_us`='Maximum volume less than minimum', `ru_Ru`='Максимальный объём меньше минимального' WHERE `id`=601; UPDATE `LABEL` SET `en_us`='Maximum volume less than minimum' WHERE `id`=665;
